lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help make our world a better place.

lender.name: MONICA
lender.loan_because: It's my way of helping to improve the quality of life for others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to help others who have the enthusiasm and commitment to help themselves find a better life.
lender.occupational_info: My work involved teaching high school teenagers about world cultures. They enjoyed tasting new foods and learning about the history of previous cultures and current cultures that we share this earth with.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupation: Mother of two, and editor of a growing web site
lender.loan_because: Achieving these business upgrades will make a very significant difference in the lives of these families. With my help and the continued hard work of their parents, the children in these families will hopefully have more opportunities in their future.
lender.occupational_info: I publicize kids' events, activities, articles, books, & toy ideas for children 8 and under. The great ideas go beyond city limits, but the newsletter events are region-specific to Boulder / Denver (Colorado, USA) and expanding to other areas soon.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.occupation: Retired, pt music and events coordinator
lender.loan_because: I want to help others not only survive but succeed.

lender.name: The Romberg Family
lender.loan_because: Because we want to help people.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to see Hope in their attempt to become independently secure. I feel it an Honor to be able to share with our brothers and sisters in every country, around the world, the opportunity to become self employed.
lender.occupational_info: My mission is to see all people fed, while seeking freedom, peace, and justice for all human beings..aka firep0w3r

lender.name: Leanne & Codie
lender.loan_because: To try to make a difference in the world

lender.name: drewkie
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a start

lender.name: rhonda
lender.loan_because: to give is better than to receive
lender.occupational_info: Import of tiles from Asia for distribution and sales within Europe and North America.

lender.name: michelle
lender.occupation: mom, wife and lover of life
lender.loan_because: I want to help others because my church, The Summit, has a motto ...Love God, Love People... and I want that to be motto of how I live my life.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: With so little you can empower and change the life of others.

lender.name: Lauge
lender.loan_because:
Micro credit is the way to go! Even I as a student can afford to help in this highly effective way.
I lend money so not to create donor fatigue and then lend them again once I get them back.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters. I need to give to those who do not have the opportunity that I do... In my culture, I am broke, but compared to others I am rich, so, I give what I can in hopes that I will make someones life a little better, if only for a day...
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and adolescents who are dealing with mental illness, violence and an unstable family home.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always attained by giving them to someone else. -- Unknown
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones, write letters and set-up mettings for the co-owners of a cellular phone company. The work is a little boring but the people I work with are fun.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to improve their own situation by hard work and business, deserves our help.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in any way I can to achieve their goals and dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in a wildlife hospital. I love my job, it is sometimes very sad but it is amazing to work with and help the animals especially when you see them recover and be released back into the wild.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: all the cool kids do it.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure cable television is delivered to homes across the world on time and within the highest broadcast standards.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Anthony ter Neuzen
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving some trust and a little help to everyone who needs it, especially when I can afford to do just that. The modern "professional" banking institutions seem to have forgotten about that basic principle a long time ago.
lender.occupational_info: I work mostly in theatre and travel around the world with musical company's and bands.

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.loan_because: I am freelance Writer/Editor of Science Books. But I want to start my own Publication.

lender.name: aniruddha
lender.loan_because: i am needy & want to earn money more & more . we have no any type of financial support and willing to work .
lender.occupational_info: i have 10 sewing machines but not nay type odf financila help from anyone. we want to start work with 10 persons so that we could earn the money and serve the poor also in the community

lender.name: Renae
lender.occupational_info: My work is very sociable as I get to talk to different people everyday and learn about their lives. My job involves serving people drinks.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wms-Singleton Family
lender.loan_because: we had the chance to do so through our church's "reverse offering." Our church gave all its members money to make a difference. We're happy to contribute in this way and hope to continue to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for social change. David helps former felons; Verna teaches law students. Our daughter is an activist in training.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have always had the good fortune of others believing in and supporting my dreams. Giving back is my way of continuing this cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English (reading and writing) to 7th and 8th graders (11 to 13 year olds).

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: It's a new solution to an age old problem.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I make jewelry and glass art objects.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Abera
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bookseller.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that prosperity is everyone's God given birthright. Prosperity comes in many forms, Health, Happiness, Financial Blessings to name a few. I believe it is God's will that everyone should live a life of purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners build effieciences in the collections, disbursements and information reporting aspects of their companies.

lender.name: Filar
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Holly & Graham
lender.loan_because: We think everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams and are proud to be a part of making it happen.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for ourselves. I am a freelance art director & photographer. Graham works for himself as a contractor. As a team, we guide small group safaris in Southern Africa.

lender.name: Elizabeth and David
lender.loan_because: A friend gave us a gift certificate for our wedding. What a wonderful way to celebrate love and life.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I have had many people help me over the course of my lifetime who I can never pay back. Everyone needs help from time to time, so if I can help in some small way then I am able to perform the same kindness that was given to me. If my helping someone else inspires them to help others when they get a chance, then I will have been a part of a cycle of helping others that will continue to produce some good in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from Verizon Communications where my job title was Service Technician. I installed and repaired telephone lines and equipment for 32 yrs. Now I am self-employed and have my own telephone repair and installation business.

lender.name: Rajay
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a highly effective means of helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make investments in companies to faciliate their growth and enable investors to grow their asset base.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: I have money that I don't use, others can use them in the mean time.
lender.occupational_info: Electricity construction

lender.name: Saulo
lender.loan_because:

lender.loan_because: When I needed a loan, others were there for me. So I would like to be there for others.

lender.name: festival
lender.loan_because: Hello? Will you tell us a story?

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping hard working entrepreneurs helping themselves and their families to a better life. As a father I try to be a role model for my children and others by making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a car company as a project leader / engineer developing new cars.

lender.name: Brian & Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help spread the world's wealth
lender.occupational_info: I help run a business making millions of pounds of hot chocolate beverages.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: i want to help others
lender.occupational_info: looking after old people in a home

lender.name: SIID
lender.loan_because: microfinance is a great and easy way of helping reduce poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students educating ourselves on development and doing our bit to help.

lender.name: Eric and Alice
lender.loan_because: we are very blessed and we want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We help business and individuals become more successful via technology

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe it's an effective way to give people a hand up instead of a hand out, and it's truly productive toward overcoming poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the office, I manage our computer network, I build a database, and I run event registration for an organization that trains Urban Youth Leaders.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I love the global spirit of sharing through Kiva! We place our humble contributions in the hands of brave, hard-working visionaries and build beautiful little bridges across nations and humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I write for the corporate world, which means that I make things that aren't very interesting or important seem very interesting and important. Confused? Me too, but it pays the bills and helps me to support Kiva. It's an honor to be a part of the Kiva community! With lovingkindness all things are possible.

lender.name: Ugur
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance, as long as they are honest and hard working people...no matter who they are, no matter what their race is, no matter what their religion is.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Graphic Designer & Photographer and I love what I do. I'm very happy to be able to help others and hope to do this for a long time....touching other people's lives touches my own in a wonderful way.

lender.name: Sandra & Jon
lender.loan_because: we can ... !

lender.name: Planet Keepers
lender.loan_because: We believe education is very important. We think that all people should have the chance to have some fun. We believe that all people deserve housing and clothing.
lender.occupational_info: We are the 8 year old class at the Anchorage Unitarian Universalist Fellowship. We raised money to fund loans by making host a soup and bread lunch.

lender.name: Janneke de Ruiter
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship can change something in the world. I hope our loan can make a difference to these people and wish them luck with their business.

lender.name: susie Q
lender.loan_because: Exciting opportunity to help people help themselves !

lender.name: Kika
lender.loan_because: There are many people in this world who are striving to do well and I want to help them out! As long as I am able...I will!
lender.occupational_info: High school Student

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God has granted me so many blessings, and I think Kiva is a great way to share His goodness with others.

lender.name: Rolande & Wout
lender.loan_because: I wish for all these projects to have a positive and succesful outcome!

lender.name: ali
lender.loan_because: the family atteddance reguired
lender.occupational_info: cosmetics shopping large store

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do with the wealth God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people resolve conflict.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: There are so many of us that have so much & those that have so little. I find it refreshing being able to loan money to those that are trying to make an impact on their own lives.

lender.loan_because: We feel that micro-loans are a great way to invest in people
lender.occupational_info: Doctor, artist, kids

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help out! I have gotten so much why not give some of it.

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: We are all so lucky to be living lives where we get all of our essential needs fulfilled plus luxury items. It is time to spread the wealth to people not as fortunate :)

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I feel great about helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help artists get jobs and manage their careers

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I feel that microcredit loans can empower people to improve their lives. Also, I wish that everyone could have had the same opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: Carmina

lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs in need.

lender.name: Whitney

lender.occupational_info: I am in my senior year at Gustavus Adolphus College pursuing degrees in Spanish and Honors History with a minor in Latin America, Latino and Caribbean Studies.

lender.name: Erynn
lender.loan_because: others have helped me and I want to help others as best I can. I believe that there is something massively wrong with modern western society and that only conscious individual action within community can help put things right.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a disabled US Navy veteran. When I have the time and energy, I write articles, poetry and books and I act as a priestess in my community. I've worked with nonprofit organizations in my spiritual community and done interfaith work toward AIDS/HIV awareness and care.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: i want to help people control their destiny.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor. I invest in companies that i believe have good growth prospects but that are substantially undervalued by the market. I seek a reasonable rate of return that will generate, over the long term, capital gains and dividends commensurate to or slightly better than that of the S&P500.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of micro-finance.

lender.name: Sutton
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: caroline
lender.loan_because: i believe in helping those who are trying to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: mother of 4, stepmother of 5, grandmother of 16 and doctor's wife

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I care about those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school studying politics in order to change the world for the better.

lender.name: Jeff Lohman
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can afford to give $25 every Saturday before my morning coffee and so can you!
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a local public school and I also coach the girls and boys varsity soccer teams at the high school..

lender.name: Dru and Merri-Lee
lender.loan_because: A little love goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in commercial real estate. Merri-Lee cares for sick babies.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others help themselves. What better way to do this than with microloans. I know the little I give helps someone else in the world have a better life and a brighter future. Thank you Kiva for making this possible for so many hard working people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a 1 ton truck in northern Canada delivering general goods in the city of Prince George. I love getting to know my customers and being able to serve them and their business. I feel I am a part of each business team and enjoy providing them with professional timely transporting solutions. My customers needs are always my number 1 priority and this is what has made my business successful. I offer 25 years of Courier experience in an ever growing and changing business environment.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: People need help. I can help in this way. Thank you for making this possible.

lender.name: Briony
lender.loan_because: I have so much and it gives me joy to share and see others better themselves

lender.name: Family of Four
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are a working family. Both back working now.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the methods used by KIVA. I have so much and this gives me a chance to give with trust that the help will go where I want it to.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work in Public Health research.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.occupation: Illinois Army National Guard and college student

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone, even in a small way, to reach his or her goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer who, along with architects, designs buildings and the property they lay on. I currently live in Atlanta, GA, USA.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It allows me to play a part in improving the economy of a developing country.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure airplanes are safe to fly.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have and would like to help make an impact in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids at a center where they can come and be safe.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.occupational_info: I assist individual and business clients with income tax planning and compliance.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference. A strong female presence strengthens the family and the village. I like to support women around the world so they can improve their lives and those of their family and village.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can. And so should you.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: There are so many amazing people in the world who are less fortunate than we are. A little goes a long way. Give up that pair of jeans you wanted to buy and donate that money you would have used and donate it to someone who really needs it to sustain their lives and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am an occupational therapist. I help people who have been injured physically or mentally. I help them with their everyday tasks we sometimes take for granted.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: For my 7th birthday party I decided to ask my freinds to give a donation to Kiva instead of a gift. My friends and I do pay it forward birthdays and I really wanted to give to these people in need. (Sept 2007)
lender.occupational_info: We have a family business that helps children learn the gift of giving.

lender.name: Gil
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone have an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We provide water pump service for homes in our area. Everyone needs clean water.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: My dad and I do it together. It's a great way to help people and you don't lose any money. It's fun!

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can and kiva makes it so easy to do something that makes a difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I have about 15 people who work for me. We answer phones and answer questions about dental insurance.

lender.name: Volatile Monkey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to help us both prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at the university.

lender.name: allison
lender.loan_because: I am Connected.
lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling

lender.name: Zachira
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we all helped each other, the world would be a much better place.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I work hard for my money and I love knowing that it continues to work hard for someone trying to make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver packages to businesses and residentials in central Oahu

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Because I am fortunate enough to be able to, and feel I have a responsibility to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work with research to try to understand how the universe began, what different things it is made of and how it has evolved. I also teach university students in physics.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, as others have helped me in times of need. You are inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I work with all different types of people.

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: I have started up a small cottage industry, part-time, with hopes of it becoming a source of retirement income. I know what I have accomplished to make it this far. I want to pass on the sense of pride in creating a viable business, and help build the confidence that they can succees with the help of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children about creative thinking, teamwork and how to learn about the world through art. They see me model it as I design and teach basket-making.

lender.name: larry
lender.loan_because: We are all better off in every way when we help others help themselves. Change one person and you change the world.

lender.name: mzungu
lender.loan_because: of love

lender.name: Teri
lender.occupation: Nurse massage therapist and designer, seamstress
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in my life and I want to share my blessings with others. When I got upsized out of my nursing job and the economy had a negative effect on my massage therapy job I was able to start a business called terirecycles with the help of my husband, I now sell off my website, terirecycles.com and at boutiques and street fairs.
lender.occupational_info: I provide massage for peoples of all kinds, sick, dying and in good health with a few aches and pains. I listen and provide healing touch. My recycle business is about making things we all enjoy out of items we have either discarded or passed on. It is about giving a new lease on life to a person or thing. Doing anything with love and kindness makes the world go round!

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: People reap what they sow.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: My experiences in developing countries are always in my heart, and have changed the way I think and act.
lender.occupational_info: I work with low-income families living in public housing and coordinate programs to meet their various needs.

lender.name: Bartholomew
lender.loan_because: it is a small thing that can be very big, and it's something I can do right now.

lender.name: Cleo
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to have the life that I have and I want to give others the chance to have a great life too.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I know my modest contribution will make a difference and through Kiva I feel like I'm part of the solution for a change. Bravo to the founders and all who are making it work!
lender.occupational_info: I retired from a job with a non-profit company that helps people achieve home ownership. It is called Options for Homes and was started in Toronto, Canada.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because:
Because I believe that grassroots work is incredibly significant work. Because there are mamas and babas all over the world who want a good future for their children. Because the world is full of people containing all things good yet lacking in resources. Because it is fun. Because I miss international work and this is a way to be involved. Because I can.
... And here is a shout out to RPCV's too. :) (Kenya 01-03)
lender.occupational_info: My work is to talk to children and parents to ensure that kids are not being abused or neglected and are safe to live in their homes.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed!
lender.occupational_info: I interview people and write articles about their lives.

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop software that is used in hospitals.

lender.name: SHANIL C.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef / Sales Consultant to the Food Industrie .

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, and I would like to share
lender.occupational_info: I taught history to 16 year olds and loved it.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give back to the world and help people get started in business.
lender.occupational_info: I support computer systems to run business processes and find ways to solve business problems. My wife has started her own business from scratch and understands the challenges of getting started.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because:
It is such a fabulous way to make a difference. As a small business owner myself I respect people who are looking for ways to improve their businesses and be self sufficient. I appreciate having the opportunity to see the people wo are looking for loans and hear about their plans.
I enjoy sewing, gardening, cooking, and farmers markets so these types of businesses will be the ones most likely to catch my eye.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make sure that the medical devices they design and manufacture are safe and effective. I do this by developing and delivering training classes for their employees, by performing audits of their business practices, by helping them design or improve business systems. I've been in the industry for 28 years and am proud that our industry makes products that improve people's lives.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe that collectively individuals can help to make a global impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help make the internet a safer place by fighting cybercrime.

lender.name: Tai
lender.loan_because: I love to help those whose know how to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I bring truck load of products, goods and supplies materials etc... to companies and market distribution center nation wide or disaster area such as the city of New Orleans, LA and Gulfport, MS during Hurricane Katrina period.

lender.name: Celiene
lender.loan_because: I can. It brings me great joy!

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: At some point in time in our lives we all need help. It is an awesome responsibility to be a great steward over the finances with which God entrusts us. I am grateful to be in a position to help someone us to fulfill their goals and their dreams.

lender.name: Sridhar
lender.loan_because: want to keep in touch with the world
lender.occupational_info: i like the work whatever i am doing here.

lender.name: Wendie
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live the way I do and just would like to help others. There was a time when my family didn't have all we needed and I remember how hard it was.
lender.occupational_info: I am an EMT and work on an emergency ambulance. I am also a registered nurse and work part time in the emergency room of the only hospital on our island.

lender.name: DEBI
lender.loan_because: I AM ALWAYS GRATEFUL TO BE ABLE TO SHARE MY BLESSINGS WITH OTHERS BECAUSE I KNOW WHEN WE GIVE TO ONE ANOTHER IN ANY FORM WE ARE ALWAYS GIFTED BACK DOUBLE HENCE WHAT BLESSES ONE BLESSES ALL.
lender.occupational_info: I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR RUNNING THE OFFICE AND ALL THE PAPERWORK THAT IS REQUIRED FOR OUR COMMERCIAL PLUMBING BUSINESS.

lender.name: Georgie
lender.loan_because: I realise that for the small amounts that can be given, it can make a big difference in someones life, that not only impacts on that one individual but on their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at university, and also work part time at a supermarket

lender.name: Beau
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I heard about this site on Oprah and realised that even a small donation will make an enormous difference for another family

lender.name: Balagurunathan
lender.loan_because: i am in very critical situation in business. i would like to solve all the problems and devolop the business.

lender.loan_because: I'm a BoBo

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to get people start their own business, anywhere in the world
lender.occupational_info: I manage business, accounting and financial transactions in a private company

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: access to credit is essential if people in developing countries are to escape from cycles of poverty and marginalisation.

lender.name: MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: i loan here because i can help others reach independence and a better life for themselves and their families. i feel that by lending in this manner equips the individuals and keeps their dignity..its not just a handout, but a statement of my belief in them that i think they can do it, be a success...to rise above.
lender.occupational_info: follower of Jesus Christ, wife, mother of two wonderful young adults, grandma to one precious boy....learning to love and appreciate each day's blessings.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I believe in every persons ability to change his/her life through hard work.

lender.name: Gisle
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician, performing electronic music and I write music for films.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help someone else with an opportunity to create or expand their business and make a decent living
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations make their management systems work better

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
Everything I have is on loan from God.
Matthew 25:14-30
lender.occupational_info: Communicator

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I love being part of a global support team!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I know how fulfilling it can be to be your own boss, and to make your own living.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a typical corporate American office for a huge company. I spend 40 hrs a week siting at a computer, analysing financials.

lender.name: NANCY
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and i believe what goes around comes around and you never know when it might be someone you love that needs a helping hand

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: No one does it alone. We all need luck and a helping hand. As the recipient of both, I like to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with people who want to start businesses and with businesses in transition.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I believe in the saying that "If you're not outraged, then you haven't been paying attention"

lender.name: Nicu
lender.loan_because: I loved the idea, from the first time I heard about it and I wanted to get involved. It is we, the little people, that have the chance to prove to world that things can be changed by the power of compassion, rather then by endless politics.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I have been inpired to give to those in need. If I can touch someones life and bring positive change it is very rewarding. It is our duty to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in injury prevention and safety in a high risk sport. I help with the development of updated safety equipment ,safety training and coordinate the delivery of medical services for injured employees in the thoroughbred horse racing in California.

lender.name: Andi
lender.loan_because: I want to share

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's a neat idea
lender.occupational_info: I make software to fix problems for people

lender.name: Michelle Gervais
lender.loan_because: I feel like one person or $25 can make all the difference in the world to someone. I also believe that people just need a chance in life sometimes and I absolutely LOVE this organization. God Bless you all.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a bar/restaurant in Manhattan, NY.

lender.name: dan
lender.loan_because: if I were in these people's positions (which any of us obviously could have been), I would hope that those more fortunate than me would be socially conscious and generous with their resources. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell large groups of mortgages from business to business which are securitized and sold on the US secondary market.

lender.name: ARF
lender.loan_because: when a single person builds a business that they value, they naturally become more interested in supporting the Rule of Law, and this benefits the entire world. This is also why I think it is better to concentrate my loans in a specific area rather than spread them over the world: when two neighboring entrepreneurs band together to support justice and law, the whole is greater than the sum of parts.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying electrical engineering. I hope to apply what I learn through entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Law-Nerd
lender.loan_because: Somedays it seems as though no matter how hard I work, the judicial system is bigger than I am and wins far more often than it ought to. Since I can't always be successful, helping others keeps the balance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with legal problems deal with the Court system to get custody or access to their children, when divorcing or separating from their partners.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am able. I hope it is the right thing to do. Time will tell.

lender.name: roy
lender.loan_because: Why not? It can only help our world community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying in IT.

lender.name: SubhaA
lender.loan_because: I like to see people happy
lender.occupational_info: An enterprenuer striving to make an impact

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: interdependence is essential.

lender.name: Kathrin and Rick
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in developing countries to realize their dreams of becoming entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, blessed to be born in the United States. While I am not rich with money, I have health and opportunity. When I can help others to achieve their goals, I do what I can. I admire spirit, hard work and like to share.
lender.occupational_info: I write for magazines, and I draw whenever I can. I sell my drawing, and look hard for places to sell my writing. With the internet to do business on, I don't meet the people who hire me, but I have drawn for customers all over the world. I work at what I love to do!

lender.name: Annalise
lender.occupational_info: I sell bonds to Institutional Investors

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea and am glad to help out by lending

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I serve a quality dining experience to people.

lender.name: mari
lender.occupational_info: I design, program and optimize web sites.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: When I have needed help, friends and families have been there for me.
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites, videos, and productions that include photography, music, video and graphics.

lender.name: Cheryl L.
lender.loan_because: I live in America and I am blessed. This is my small way of contributing to the solution to end global poverty. I want to help others grow their own wealth so they can contribute to the planet in a positive way. Kiva makes giving fun and easy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company as a program manager. I manage the schedules and timelines of people who invent and design computer software for consumers.

lender.name: Giant Cricket Farm
lender.loan_because: I have the resources I need, and enough to share with others who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the communications division of our office, making sure that our projects and people hear all of the news from the company. At home, I raise goats, make yarn, and weave.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I think this a wonderful idea and something I can do to help other knitters and textile folks.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women from all over the world. While working on English and literacy, we all learn a lot from one another.

lender.name: Penny and Brent Teem
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a home health nurse

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I know how very blessed we are in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I help children and families deal with their problems.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupation: Network Operations Engineer / Student of Geography

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I feel I have had some success in my life and would like to show that capitalism works. I too have a small business and understand how difficult it can be getting started and the needs for capital to expand an existing or start-up business.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved with computer and network support for the US branch of the company I work for. I also peform Quality Assurance testing for software applications for other companies. I also have a small computer and network support business on the side.

lender.name: Avery Morrow
lender.loan_because: If I were in their place I'd want a loan too.

lender.name: Bubba Q
lender.loan_because: I think if I had a chance to meet most of the poeple on the website, and they asked to borrow 25 bucks, I'd lend it to them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach humans to stop thinking and just play with me.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.occupational_info: I help scientsts study how plants, animals and people work.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I couldn't possibly have achieved what I have without the help of those more fortunate than I. This' a chance to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Studying Political Science and Philosophy at the University of Western Ontario.

lender.name: Rosita
lender.loan_because: To honour my parents who made the difficult move from Paraguay to Canada with four small children, and through their hard work raised our standard of living. I wish to help others improve their lives as well.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other as we are all one!

lender.name: The Parkins
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of three (with a baby on the way). One of us is a freelance writer, the other is a teacher and the third is only 2 and-a-half years old.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help give others a chance to achieve their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I provide management consulting services to the United States government.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: "I think that it's important for every single person, no matter what they do in life, to participate in the well-being of humanity and the planet."--Selma Hayek.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the power of entrepreneurship to empower people. True growth comes from seeing with your own eyes what you are capable of.
In the summer of 2008 I cycled across the United States with Gabriela and we talked to people about Kiva. People often asked us if we were riding for a cause. Kiva became that cause.
lender.occupational_info: I build bad-ass websites.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to create long-term solutions to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: it seems like a really good way to help the glocal community
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids in a school setting who are deemed severely emotionally disturbed

lender.name: Meera
lender.loan_because: I want to actively do something to change the inequalities in the world that we are confronted with everyday. I feel connected to someone far away, struggling to stand up on their own. Only wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: I write books of fiction, articles and essays and teach college-my students are undergraduates and graduates.

lender.name: Stacie
lender.loan_because: I've been given a great deal of help in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with ancient languages (Greek and Latin) and ancient authors (Homer, Plato, Herodotus).

lender.name: Angela
lender.occupation: Loan Officer for a non-profit lender
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is the right thing to do and because IT WORKS!!!
lender.occupational_info: We must all help those that are unable to help themselves.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I was really lucky to be born in the USA.

lender.name: steve n.
lender.occupational_info: i solve problems

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: There is not quite enough altruism in what I do day-to-day. I feel like I am not doing enough to help.... anyone. I hope to help make a difference in people's lives, even if it is someone I may never meet.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for a hosting company in New York City.

lender.name: Charlyn
lender.loan_because: Even the smallest amount can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom to 2 beautiful boys.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I develop services to keep elderly and disabled people living independently in the community

lender.name: Jim and Jean
lender.loan_because: connecting one-to-one is the best way to provide for a life that everyone should have. I applaud those who have applied for loans and are working hard to know a fuller life.
lender.occupational_info: Jim - a retired secondary English teacher, and Jean - a retired secondary Home economics teacher. We both want and need to give from the abudance that life in Canada has given us.

lender.name: Mita
lender.loan_because: I know it can make a difference, even if small. Sometimes, that's all one needs!!
lender.occupational_info: I started Cellucid not too long ago to provide advanced interface solutions to users of hand-held devices.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to help others make a difference in the world ... one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Real Estate brokerage

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone need a hand up sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I build homes for families that need a safe and stable place to live and raise their families.

lender.name: Micki
lender.loan_because: I've got so much; there are people the world over with very little, and they're happy to have it. We should all be a little more grateful for what we have.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for produces polycrystalline silicon for use in solar panels and computer chips.

lender.name: GBVC
lender.occupational_info: GBVC is an optometric office -- we provide eye and vision care to children and adults.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. (much love for J.C.)
lender.occupational_info: I work for an advertising agency where I come up with ideas for video, print and the interactive world and am working on my longterm goal which is to use the power of advertising and communication for good.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: The world will be a better place if everyone in it is prosperous.
lender.occupational_info: I help build telescopes to let us understand the universe.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I think it is a very powerful new way to support grassroots development.
lender.occupational_info: I teach strategic management in the School of Education at the University of Pittsburgh.

lender.name: Jim NZ
lender.loan_because: I can afford to help people who will work hard to improve their world, even one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep the Internet running, to keep people communicating.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I care about helping those in need in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family & my home through cooking, cleaning, gardening, etc.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe as women, we need to support each other in times of need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, a mother of four boys, a photographer, and a believer in the right to equality.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with People who do not have . and to help where help is needed most. Its always good to give
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired. And now I have the time to look out and see all the hardship in the world. And maybe in some small way I can help.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Kiva has harnessed technology and the heart. Who doesn't want to be able to help people move from poverty to a better way of life?
lender.occupational_info: I work with other educators to make sure the teaching and learning environment for children is appropriate in order to prepare them for their lives as adults. To challenge children to learn about learning and thinking creatively.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: It is a novel way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help children who have been abused feel safer in the world. I help their parents help them to feel safer in the world.

lender.name: P&K
lender.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place...

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because:
Too often we under-estimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around. -- Dr. Felice Leonardo Buscaglia
$25 is a new pair of pants, a haircut, a dinner out or a tank of gasoline here in the USA. But my $25+ your $25+ her $25+his $25 changes the quality of life for someone in another country! WOW! Together it takes so little to do so much!
lender.occupational_info: Lending through KIVA gives me the satisfaction of being part of a fast growing movement to improve lives and put an end to poverty. I'm proud to be a part of the KIVA community.

lender.name: Keri & Pete
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place...

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: Serving food and beer to tourist to my region

lender.name: Bastian Family
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed and enjoy sharing those blessings with others

lender.name: Mario Rietveld
lender.loan_because: My dad said it would be a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Fights crime "on the block".

lender.name: Vanderhorst Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I'm just starting, but it sounds like a great idea to help someone make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own a company with my sister, which makes custom precast concrete stairs.

lender.name: the Flores family
lender.loan_because: We are working on becoming "global citizens".
lender.occupational_info: social services

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupation: host of Synchronicity on 101.9 fm or www.citr.ca
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount can make such a huge difference. I love that this money empowers small business owners. It's not a hand out; it's not charity. It's simply an opportunity. I also love how I can keep loaning the same money over and over again. It feels really good:)
lender.occupational_info: I host a weekly talk show that airs Mondays @ 12 noon, Pacific time. You can listen live or to podcasts at http://www.SpiritualShow.com

lender.name: Marvia
lender.loan_because: My small contribution will make a huge difference in the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor one congregation and provide oversight for 4 missions in a remote coastal area of Panama. It's a life of daily adventures as I partner with others in proclaiming the Good News in practical ways to many who are in need.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I love to help others, I hope to see others have a chance to succeed in Life also...
lender.occupational_info: I'm A Store Owner, i sell Household Decor/ and antiques.

lender.name: Val & Sabrina and family
lender.loan_because: In our lives we earned enough credit to be loaned monies for our business as well.
lender.occupational_info: Both of us work with many types of children and adults from many different places in the world not just from the United States, so we are pleased to provide valuable services to many individuals on a daily basis.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It will make a difference to the quality of life of another person
lender.occupational_info: I help my company to communicate with its employees

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Others have loaned to me in time of need and it really helped me to become self-sufficient and to reach my goals.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate trauma/injury prevention programs for a large academic hospital system.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have many blessings in my life and want to extend them to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with attorneys who represent banks and other lending institutions. My main focus is preparing residential and commercial mortgage financing.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I'm a big believer in micro-finance. The idea of helping someone to help themselves just feels like the best thing I could do for someone.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: We all need help one day.

lender.name: gregg & james
lender.loan_because: If we can help a few others then why not. And we all know money doesn't make you happy, but it can make life easier.
lender.occupational_info: Gregg sits in front of a computer and process repair requests all day long. James is an Artist we both do lots of paperwork its boring but it pays the bills

lender.name: Janprikyldha
lender.loan_because: the money that we believe is a small amount can make a major impact in the lives of others in different countires

lender.name: Brad and Marlene
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and would like to share some of that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Fly airplane filled with passengers and cargo around the world. Control airplanes as they approach our airport.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: "Do not withhold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act." -Proverbs 3:27
lender.occupational_info: my heart beats for Jesus and people.

lender.name: Klima
lender.loan_because: you do what you can.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I came into some money from an inheritance and I wanted to share it. It's good to be able to help other people who have small businesses and need only small loans to help them grow and develop. I love being able to lend the same money over and over to help many different people.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my 2 lovely children and am just returning to university to study a second BA

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live a productive life and provide for themselves and their family. I want to help people in the world feel the pride of a job well done.
lender.occupational_info: I design and draft the plans for solar electric systems for business, residential and government applications.

lender.name: Kathleen & Larry
lender.loan_because: Just paying it forward!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the choice to stay in their homeland, with family and friends, rather than risk the loss of everything, including their own life, when forced to emigrate.
lender.occupational_info: My work develops health and wellbeing knowledge, skills and programs to care for computer workers / Knowledge workers / eWorkers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People helping people...how could you not?

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can't not.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit
lender.occupational_info: teaching through good food

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: It's an amazing opportunity to connect globally in such a positive way.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I like to see people able to get ahead in life and make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the uniform room of an exclusive hotel.

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people around the world, especially in the areas of education and literacy.
lender.occupational_info: I am public librarian in Los Angeles.

lender.name: Jason B.
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to own my own business and I'm happy to play a small part for others to share in the joy of building their own livelihood.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone else in the world, then maybe one day someone will help me if and when I need it. Sierra Leone is in dire need for monetary support, and I hope that my measly $25 US allows someone to succeed. Best of Luck to the man who uses my money wisely.
lender.occupational_info: I play a professional sport called Paintball. I also work for T-Mobile, a wireless carrier.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: To afford opportunity to persons striving to improve their lives and those of their loved ones in the midst of challenging circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Formerly represented a parts producer to N. American car manufacturers.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to send some interest free capital back to people living in areas that our brothers, fathers, and forefathers have been extracting capital. . . . and for other more humanitarian reasons too:)
lender.occupational_info: I get called at the last minute, to go into almost any type of educational role in any classroom in any school in the area. It is a lot of variety and mostly a lot of fun.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in life and have received so much to be thankful for. NOW it's time that I give something back and give another fellow human being an opprtunity in life.
lender.occupational_info: My law practice is devoted entirely to criminal defense... I represent people who are accused of commiting crimes.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: Every positive we put into the world no matter how small creates a better world. Even if it's just a smile, a hug, or a small donation.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: This is how you change the world. I like to give, but I like to give even more when I know its making a difference in the world. Building economies and helping small business is how you solve some of the worlds biggest problems.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell houses for a profit.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to recognize someone else's hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach second grade students and try to help them become thoughtful, independent people

lender.name: Bonita
lender.loan_because: People helped me when I needed it. Giving help to others is the best way to say "thank you" for the blessings I've received.
lender.occupational_info: I write about real situations in business, law and politics, and how it affects people. I also write silly stories for fun, to make people smile.

lender.name: Azizy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am just a student

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Hopefully my contribution can help someone in an underdeveloped part of the world achieve a little independence.
lender.occupational_info: Researching ways to improve product quality and production in farmed Southern Bluefin tuna. I also have a part time video production business. Without doubt my most challenging work is keeping up with my 2 children both under 4 yo!

lender.name: J'nae
lender.loan_because: Its a great cause!
lender.occupational_info: I organize and run peoples Weddings

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Flip, twist, turn, and learn!

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given much is expected

lender.name: Trish and Paul
lender.loan_because: Helping others to become independent and give them a sense of achievement.
lender.occupational_info: I am a house wife at the moment and about to start my own business as a Demartini Breakthrough Coach. and a Lifewave Distributor.

lender.name: Jeff, JB
lender.loan_because: Itâs everyoneâs responsibility to share the blessings theyâve been given. âTo one who is given much, much is expectedâ.
lender.occupational_info: I talk with representatives of manufacturing companies, and try to convince them that using my company, is there best option, for delivering their, products.

lender.name: bupt
lender.loan_because: i want
lender.occupational_info: a volunteer

lender.name: David Cottrell
lender.loan_because: It kinda goes along with my website I guess. ukraineorphans.net
lender.occupational_info: I was a market and product development specialist in the plastics industry.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing can have a much bigger impact on improving people's lives than all these investments by big corporates.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a German research & development company that provides innovative solutions in almost all fields of our lives. My job is in financial management.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: As a mother I enjoy helping others to support their families, because I know how worthwhile their hard work is. I choose the Kiva way to help because I believe it lets them maintain their dignity more than a donation would. When their loans are successfully repaid, they have the additional benefit of having begun the creation of a good credit history. Confidence and self respect can be built by the people who borrow, as they are able to gain more control in their lives. I am proud of the efforts they make under difficult circumstances.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to help women support their family.
lender.occupational_info: Help business owners run and grow their businesses.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it triggers business activities of the micro entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Only one in 6 billion who wants to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Staff of N.I.C.U.
lender.loan_because: To make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are the staff of the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit at St. Joseph's Hospital in London, Ontario, Canada. We care for premature and sick babies and their families.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It's just part of being a Global citizen
lender.occupational_info: Derivative trading & structuring across developed & emerging markets. Use to live in Africa - & miss it!

lender.name: Marita
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and can share.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a retired elementary teacher, and work now as a Marriage Family Therapist, where I counsel people on their relationships.
I am also actively raising money for the Saboba Medical Centre, Saboba, Ghana

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to have been given the opportunity to get an education and work at a good job that enables me to live well. I want to pass along to others the opportunity that was given to me. I hope that once they have used the opportunity well, that they will pass it along again, to their children or to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help builders to build and run shopping centers.

lender.name: Markeith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the development of business around the world both large and small.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their money

lender.name: Howard
lender.occupational_info: I teach college so others can become artists and designers, and work in my studio to create art.
